00001 /* ras-stack.cpp: Conventional fixed capacity Return Address Stack predictor */
00002 /*
00003  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT
00004  */
00005 
00006 #define COMPONENT_NAME "stack"
00007 
00008 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00009 if(!strcasecmp(COMPONENT_NAME,type))
00010 {
00011   int size;
00012   if(sscanf(opt_string,"%*[^:]:%[^:]:%d",name,&size) != 2)
00013     fatal("bad ras options string %s (should be \"stack:name:size\")",opt_string);
00014   return new RAS_stack_t(name,size);
00015 }
00016 #else
00017 
00018 class RAS_stack_t:public RAS_t
00019 {
00020   class RAS_stack_chkpt_t:public RAS_chkpt_t
00021   {
00022     public:
00023     int pos;
00024   };
00025 
00026   protected:
00027 
00028   md_addr_t *stack;
00029   int size;
00030   int head;
00031 
00032   public:
00033 
00034   /* CREATE */
00035   RAS_stack_t(char * const arg_name,
00036               const int arg_num_entries
00037              )
00038   {
00039     init();
00040 
00041     size = arg_num_entries;
00042     stack = (md_addr_t*) calloc(arg_num_entries,sizeof(md_addr_t));
00043     if(!stack)
00044       fatal("couldn't malloc stack stack");
00045 
00046     head = 0;
00047 
00048     name = strdup(arg_name);
00049     if(!name)
00050       fatal("couldn't malloc stack name (strdup)");
00051 
00052     bits = size*8*sizeof(md_addr_t);
00053     type = strdup("finite RAS");
00054   }
00055 
00056   /* DESTROY */
00057   ~RAS_stack_t()
00058   {
00059     free(stack); stack = NULL;
00060     free(name); name = NULL;
00061     free(type); type = NULL;
00062   }
00063 
00064   /* PUSH */
00065   RAS_PUSH_HEADER
00066   {
00067     head = modinc(head,size); //(head + 1) % size;
00068     stack[head] = ftPC;
00069   }
00070 
00071   /* POP */
00072   RAS_POP_HEADER
00073   {
00074     md_addr_t predPC = stack[head];
00075     head = moddec(head,size); //(head - 1 + size) % size;
00076 
00077     return predPC;
00078   }
00079 
00080   /* RECOVER */
00081   RAS_RECOVER_HEADER
00082   {
00083     class RAS_stack_chkpt_t * cp = (class RAS_stack_chkpt_t*) cpvp;
00084     BPRED_STAT(num_recovers++;)
00085 
00086     head = cp->pos;
00087   }
00088 
00089   /* RECOVER INDEX */
00090   RAS_RECOVER_STATE_HEADER
00091   {
00092     class RAS_stack_chkpt_t * cp = (class RAS_stack_chkpt_t*) cpvp;
00093     cp->pos = head;
00094   }
00095 
00096   /* GET_STATE */
00097   RAS_GET_STATE_HEADER
00098   {
00099     class RAS_stack_chkpt_t * cp = new RAS_stack_chkpt_t();
00100     if(!cp)
00101       fatal("couldn't malloc stack recovery state");
00102     return cp;
00103   }
00104 
00105   /* RET_STATE */
00106   RAS_RET_STATE_HEADER
00107   {
00108     delete(cpvp);
00109   }
00110 
00111 };
00112 
00113 #endif /* RAS_PARSE_ARGS */
00114 #undef COMPONENT_NAME
